text: Everett Hindley is a Canadian politician, who was elected to the Legislative Assembly of Saskatchewan in a by-election on March 1, 2018."Clean sweep for Sask. Party as Goudy, Francis, Hindley win provincial by-elections". CBC News, March 1, 2018. He represents the electoral district of Swift Current as a member of the Saskatchewan Party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Saskatchewan Party MLAs Category:People from Swift Current Category:21st-century Canadian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Everett Hindley
